net.objectzoo.ebc.test

Class MockAction<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.ebc.test.MockAction<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the Action's parameter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Consumer<T>, net.objectzoo.delegates.Action<T>

    public class MockAction<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.objectzoo.delegates.Action<T>
    The MockAction is an Action implementation that can be used in (unit) tests to collect the results of a tested EBC. The MockAction can be invoked as many times as the maximum invocations allowed value given at construction time before throwing an AssertionError.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MockAction()
      Creates a new MockAction with a maximum invocations allowed value of one
      MockAction(int maxInvocationsAllowed)
      Creates a new MockAction with the given maximum invocations allowed value

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        public void accept(T parameter)
        The invoke method internally counts the number of invocations and collects the given parameters. Invocations are allowed as many times as the maximum invocation allowed parameter given at construction time specifies. Excessive calls lead to an AssertionError being thrown.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface java.util.function.Consumer<T>
        Specified by:
        accept in interface net.objectzoo.delegates.Action<T>
        Parameters:
        parameter - the parameter value for the invocation
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if the maximum invocation allowed count has been exceeded

      • isInvoked

        public boolean isInvoked()
        Query if this MockAction has been invoked
        Returns:
        true if it has been invoked and false otherwise

      • getInvocationCount

        public int getInvocationCount()
        Retrieve the number of invocations that have been conducted on this MockAction
        Returns:
        the number of invocations

      • getLastResult

        public T getLastResult()
        Retrieve parameter value given to the last invocation of this MockAction. If no invocation has taken place so far an AssertionError is thrown.
        Returns:
        the parameter value of the last invocation
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if this MockAction has not been invoked yet

      • getFirstResult

        public T getFirstResult()
        Retrieve the parameter value given to the first invocation of this MockAction. If no invocation has taken place so far an AssertionError is thrown.
        Returns:
        the parameter value of the first invocation
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if this MockAction has not been invoked yet

      • getResults

        public java.util.List<T> getResults()
        Retrieve the parameter values of all invocations of this MockAction as a List .
        Returns:
        the parameter values in the order of the invocations or an empty List if this MockAction has not been invoked yet

      • assertInvoked

        public void assertInvoked()
        Assert that this MockAction has been invoked throwing an AssertionError if not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if this MockAction has not been invoked yet

      • assertInvoked

        public void assertInvoked(java.lang.String message)
        Assert that this MockAction has been invoked throwing an AssertionError with the given message if not.
        Parameters:
        message - the message for the thrown AssertionError
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError - if this MockAction has not been invoked yet
